query:
SELECT 
  p.id as projeto_id,
  p.nome as projeto_nome,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes WHERE projectId = p.id) as total_clientes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mercados WHERE projectId = p.id) as total_mercados,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concorrentes WHERE projectId = p.id) as total_concorrentes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads WHERE projectId = p.id) as total_leads
FROM projects p
WHERE p.nome LIKE '%Jeep%'
ORDER BY p.id DESC
LIMIT 1;
